评论详情: My jacket came with missing snaps! I took them to my local dry cleaner where they do alterations and they were able to repair the jacket. I kept it and it is cute. I do enjoy wearing it. The fit was to size. The fabric quality is good. The value for the money was okay even though I had to have it repaired. 🤷🏼‍♀️ if it’s waterproof or not. The material thickness is suitable for this little jacket
It's perfectly comfortable.  It can be dressy or casual and is the perfect fabric weight. Color is perfect.
It is so soft and looks amazing. Can be dressy or casual. It’s always very warm!
Belt is too high, not very flattering
I love this coat. It’s not too thick, but still warm. It is also really comfortable to wear. It’s cute, dressy or casual!
Jacket is nice and quality is good. Runs a little small.

评论概述: Looks and feels like a more expensive brand
评论详情: This is a gorgeous coat. It drapes nicely and runs true to size. My friend has an expensive version of this and you can barely tell the difference. Maybe a slight tailoring change in the shoulders. Love this and will buy in another color.
This is such a cute jacket. It’s so comfy. Doesn’t wrinkle great to travel with. So glad I made this purchase.

评论概述: All I can say is fantastic!
评论详情: I love this jacket. The fabric feels rich and the fit is spot on! Ordered a small my normal size. May be ordering in more colors!
Cute thin casual look. Can make a casual fit look more sophisticated. It’s not the warmest though. Use for spring or fall.
Loved the feel and fit of it.  Very comfortable.

This is a great sweater , super comfortable, lightweight and very soft material. It has a really nice fit and structured color which makes outfits look more polished while still feeling comfortable. Have received many compliments on this piece, excellent winter and fall staple.

I gave this a 4 * because the size does not really runs true to size. It runs bigger so I had to return and by a S size but once you find the size that fits you, it will be perfect. Cheap yet has this elegant look.

The stock photos don’t do this justice. I have it in 3 colors and everywhere I go people ask me where I got it. It’s the perfect top. I wear it buttoned to the top except for the last two buttons. The belt is attached which is nice and it’s SO slimming!

评论概述: My new "fave" much better than my loose sweatshirt
评论详情: Love the tailoring. It's the comfort of sweats but the tailoring of a jacket. I LOVE this piece!
Beautiful jacket . Perfect for fall or mild winter day. Quality is excellent for price point. Highly recommend.
Like that it is light yet warm and very soft to the touch. Can be worn as casual or dressy. I'm very happy with them purchase.

too cute! I was very skeptical of this jacket, ordered it as a last minute save that would arrive in time that was needed, but I was very much mentally prepared to return immediately out of being disappointed BUT to my surprise, it is SUPER flattering, it is soft and feels like a silky cool sweatshirt, its lightweight but surprisingly warm and also does NOT restrict movement, could drive with ease and not even aware I was wearing it (can't usually wear a coat and drive)

This cardigan is a travel essential! The fabric is comfortable, wrinkle-resistant, and the perfect weight for layering. It stays tied securely and has a great length that pairs perfectly with leggings. Stylish, practical, and super comfy—highly recommend!

This lightweight coat is not what I anticipated. It does have some give to it, but the silver snaps are not buttons, which took away from the looks of the coat.  I did not like the material and it was too small.  I returned it.

I bought the "apricot" in Medium. I am 5' 125 lbs.  The color is pinkish, the length is longer than I would prefer on me and the fabric is thin.  For the price, I will keep, but would not order again.
I really like the jacket but the snap closure pulled through material, poor quality
Lightweight, comfortable....dress up or down
Returned to small. Still waiting on the 3rd shirts to be refund ed.
Jacket arrived with a broken button. Fabric was great, however returned/refunded because of quality
This jacket is even better in person.  So great and can be easily dressed up or down.

I’m 5’7” and 155. I got a large and it fits perfect with a top underneath.  It was perfect for the weather in Italy in September.  It is warm and so comfortable.  This is a great buy.  The belt is attached on the sides of jacket and looks expressive.
Many compliments when I wore it

This is a really cute and stylish piece. It can be worn as a coat, or just as is, or with a shirt or T-shirt underneath. Comfortable, fits great, and I love the look! I will be purchasing in another color!

评论概述: Very stylish and comfortable to wear!
评论详情: I loved these so much that I order them in 3 different colors. Perfect fit and length even for this petite girl! I wear them either belted in the front or opened front with the belt looped around my lower back. These are very stylish and more feminine looking than wearing a hoodie or jacket. I love the material because it slides easily over long sleeved shirts. Order it. You will love them!
This jacket is soft, comfortable and warm. It fits well and is a little stretchy. The material is different from other jackets and I love it! Fits true to size.

The material was absolutely horrible. It didn't feel or look like anything in the picture. The sleeves were so long. They were 4 inches below my finger tips. What is wrong with long sleeves today?  Its ridiculous, it's the worst thing I've ever bought from Amazon in my life.
The color is a very light pink, almost white. The material is very soft and it’s well made. I think the style is very flattering. I ordered a second one bc I loved this one!

评论用户: I really wanted to be optimistic after unboxing and seeing some botched workmanship.  However, it didn't remain after I started putting it together and the wood split.  And no, I didn't screw in too hard.  There were other areas that had previously been poorly fixed and fell apart during assembly.  I tried to save a dime and it didn't pay with now having to wait and return this item.
评论详情: Beautiful, great quality! Fit TTS.

I wanted to love this jacket.  It looked so cute in the pictures.  What the photos don’t clearly show is that the belt is just strips/flaps(?) of fabric sewn to either side.  When I tried it on, the jacket was huge on me despite ordering by size recommendations. When tied the “belt”, the jacket looked like the old house dresses my grandmas used to wear.  Not the style I was looking for. I think if the “belt flaps” were instead a full belt and  removable it would fit and look better. Returned.
Looks great and like the quality of the material
No zipper or buttons, wraps around and ties at waist. Weird material, kind of sticky like microfiber, super thin, not warm.
Very flattering, soft fabric and can be dressed up or down. Loved it so much I go 2 in different colors. Fits great

Anrabess puts everything you want into a single versatile jacket. It’s an ideal weight for fall or spring days. Snap up the neck for a more dramatic style or lay out the collar wide for a second stylish look. The sash adds another sassy touch allowing you to cinch the waist for a lovely fit. Fabric is soft, quality weight and snaps, stitching, etc. are done with detail in mind. Works well across a variety of age, figure and budget groups — and I think that’s worth recognizing.

This jacket arrived without a wrinkle; obviously it will be easy to care for. It is really cute, and I can't find a thing wrong with it. Why it is frequently returned, I have no idea. Don't hold back from ordering it because of that alone.

This material feels super soft and luxe. I would compare the warmth to your average hoodie. You can definitely size down in this one. 5'2" 145 39-29-39 usually wear between a M & L but know from previous purchases from this brand that M would be the way to go. I could definitely have even sized down to a Small for this, but I don't mind the Medium since it has the belt to cinch it in and I can wear a sweater under this comfortably.

I’ve been wearing this all fall, and it works in a lot of situations. Sporty, casual, etc.  Packs well and washes well. It’s a perfect layer in the south when you just need a little more. The tie waist gives a great shape too.
The fabric is perfect, the fit is perfect, true to size.  I love this jacket.  Remains wrinkle free, perfect for traveling.

I love this jacket!  I ordered one in small (I'm 5'3" 115) and I just ordered 3 more.  It fits beautifully.  The tied waist is very flattering.  Fits true to size and washes nicely too-no wrinkles. It looks and feels expensive.

This is quite cute. Material weight is between a t shirt and light sweatshirt. I bought apricot but the color is like a light creamy yellow. Not at all what I wanted. It fits true to size. I just wish the color was better. Returning it.
Exactly as pictured. Color is a match to as shown. Well made..
Fits well. Adjustable tie in front. Very comfortable.
I really like the fabric and it looks sharp.

评论概述: The color is not as pictured
评论详情: This jacket arrived quickly and is nicely made with a flattering style.  The color however, is not as shown.  I ordered the army green and it's muddy brown. not green at all.  Not flattering for someone who cannot wear the earth tones.
So comfy and versatile. Wear to work or with sweats. Nice and soft. Perfect fit.
I love it ! Just perfect! Great material ! Not to thin and very comfortable

I am really impressed with this jacket! Very nice material, beautifully designed. If I had purchased this jacket/blazer-like piece of clothing on QVC, I would have paid 2 to 3 times more than  what Amazon charged. I will be watching this brand more closely! I ordered my normal size- large. It fits nicely. I am 5’5” and 153lbs. I could have gone with a size medium, but I wanted it slightly loose. I am very happy with my purchase.
Soft beautiful material
I thought this was more of a sweatshirt material but it is thinner. I like the tie around the waste to help shape.
I tried two sizes and it just didn’t quite work. The pockets made the lines of the coat lumpy.

I got this in brown in a size XL. It looks just like the pictures and fits true to size. The details are gorgeous and the hardware is well attached and works well. This is a great jacket for transitional weather and it can easily be dressed up or down for a variety of occasions. Something about the full button-up plaquet makes this jacket look especially streamlined. It's super slimming and I love it! This is going to be one of my "go-to" jackets for the foreseeable future!

This coat has no lining so it’s like wearing a sweatshirt. It falls right below my butt so I like the length. It’s roomy but has a belt so you can cinch the waist. I like that the collar stands up when it’s buttoned. Very soft and stretchy material.
The product is great, but I ordered a black for work but it came in brown :(.
Super cute but huge! I’m 5’0” 117lbs and I was swimming in a small. Would be nice for someone bigger.

This belted trench coat is stylish and perfect for fall. The wrap design is flattering, and the pockets are a nice practical touch. It’s lightweight yet dressy enough to elevate any outfit. Ideal for layering in cooler weather!

Opened my package and everything I anticipated. Fits exactly like the pics and can wear for casual with jeans or dress up with black pants for a dressier approach . Very comfortable and just enough warmth you only need a tee or light sweater underneath. I’m a former fashion buyer for a large Dept store and it’s soEven before my package was delivered this afternoon there was a generous coupon and added to my cart in another color . Went to pay tonight and the discount on my new  color was no longer there.  This is a perfect weight jacket with its trendy trench coat style . Just disappointed that the coupon went away .
The fit is great, the belt is a really nice feature. The material is very much shiny and plastic-like and is only so warm. Best for lightweight to midweight needs for warmth.
Thanks Lauren Nichole White for recommending. Love it.

评论概述: Oops! Not for non hourglass body's!
评论详情: Not for non hourglass body's!

Ordered the Brown, it sort of has an orange/red tint to it so it is NOT a flattering color.  Fit is nice (medium), but I think I would prefer a larger size so I can wear bulky clothes under.  Fabric is great, soft, not too think, smooth.  Ordering a large in a different color.
I love this jacket. Can be dressed up or down. I am a M to L typically. I bought the M & it fits perfectly. Love the weight of it - not too heavy & not too light.

I purchased the matching pants and they fit perfect and are very classic.  If you have to wear sweats on a plane at least look your best and wear something like this.  ANRABESS casual wear is a good value for the price and the fabric is good quality.  I've order several of their casual wear outfits,  and had planned to return what I didn't want.... but I'm keeping all four of them.

Very nice stylish lightweight jacket.  It's made out of thicker t-shirt material.  Not waterproof.  Would be good for work or dressing up to go out.  I really love it - bought in 2 colors.  I would go up a size if in doubt.
The fabric is flimsy but okay, the belt is way shorter than shown in the photo, the colors seem off as well.
Very comfortable cardigan with a belt and comfortable buttons, really casual and light.

I'm a solid medium in most everything I buy on Amazon. But this jacket was absolutely huge. I was also disappointed in the "quality" of the snaps. They looked fine, I guess, but they made a cheap jingle sound.
Returning it. Ordered size small and it’s large enough for size 14. It  ford to my knees. Nothing like  it shoes in the picture

I love this little jacket! I was looking for a spring/fall coat that wasn’t too warm or too heavy but warm enough for a cool day/evening. Something that travels well, that looks good with any outfit but also easy enough to carry if weather warms up.This is exactly that! And it is soft beyond my expectations!  Looks stylish but can also look simple. And bonus, I was able to wrap around my waist in case didn’t want to wear it or carry it! I hesitated to get it since I  tried and returned many others styles. But this one is a keeper!Observation: it fit nicely over thin layers but if you plan to wear it over thick sweaters, you may want to size up.  I also wish the sash/belt were a bit longer (but I guess is would look funny when untied…)
I absolutely love my new jacket. The fit is perfect to wear over clothing. I got an extra large and 5’2” & weigh 158. It actually makes me look thinner. Fits perfect. It washes beautifully.

There are some great features about this jacket. - It’s made well and the fabric is soft. It’s a 50% rayon, 45% polyester, 5% spandex blend. - the front has hidden snaps instead of buttons which is easy to get on and off and it looks stylish and expensive. - the belt feature is sewn into each side. I do wish the length of the belt was a bit longer. - there are hidden pockets on both sides.  I ordered the white in a size L, according to the size chart and my usual size. It fits well. While I think it’s cute and I will get a good amount of wear out of it, I do think this would look even better on someone longer in the body. I am short waisted and where the belt hits me isn’t as flattering as I would like.

Hmmmmm....this is very different kind of garment. The pull-tie belt is very flattering. When the coat is open, it can look a little awkward since it isn't a real belt. Also, it has snaps all down the front. Again, when it's closed, it looks fine, like a normal coat. But when it's open, it looks a little cheap. If you just need a casual, styled coat, this is a good option. It is lightweight to hold but still keeps you pretty warm. However, I think it looks fancier in the pictures than it does in real life. It is also form-fitting/fitted, so size up if you want a looser fit.

I recently wore this jacket and overall, I'm quite pleased with it. The design is sleek and versatile, featuring a stand collar, a button-down front, and a slim fit that gives it a modern touch. The mid-length overcoat style adds a touch of sophistication, while the wrap tie waist allows for adjustable fitting—whether you want to cinch it at the waist or wear it open.  The jacket is well-made with a solid color that complements a variety of outfits. The long sleeves and pockets are practical and add to its overall functionality. I opted for the black color in a size small. It has a bit of weight to it, which contributes to its warmth, but it's not overly heavy or cumbersome.  One of my favorite features is the hidden snaps, which provide a clean look when the jacket is fastened. However, it's worth noting that the black fabric does attract lint more easily than lighter colors.  Despite this minor inconvenience, the jacket keeps me warm and pairs well with almost anything in my wardrobe. I’d rate it a solid 4 out of 5 stars for its stylish design and practicality, with the lint attraction being the only drawback.

I ordered the black color. I love that the belt is stitched at the sides. You can wrap yourself up and cinch in the belt and look sophisticated and yet be super comfy because of the stretch and soft fabric. I love the snaps instead of buttons or zipper. This is a winner!
